definition: to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)
to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year

sentences.english: Bear in mind, however, that these tests were based on simulated user workloads.
sentences.chinese: 但是請記住，這些測試是以模擬的用戶負載爲基礎的。

sentences.english: This section describes the system configurations, and more in-depth information about the workload.
sentences.chinese: 本節描述系統配置，以及關於工作負載的深度信息。

sentences.english: Finally, hardware and software of the electronic load is designed.
sentences.chinese: 最後，進行了電子負載的軟硬件設計和初步實驗。

sentences.english: Good thermal transfer between heaters and load.
sentences.chinese: 良好的加熱器和負載之間的熱傳遞。

sentences.english: Most front-end load testing tools emphasize increasing the arrival rate to produce load.
sentences.chinese: 許多前端負載測試工具強調提高到達率以產生負載。

sentences.english: Most front-end load testing tools emphasize increasing the arrival rate to produce load.
sentences.chinese: 許多前端負載測試工具強調提高到達率以產生負載。

sentences.english: Some electronic load has an extra function of supply countercurrent.
sentences.chinese: 有些電子負載還具有反向充電的特殊作用。

sentences.english: The potential view of education of Taoism is loaded with Chinese education tradition.
sentences.chinese: 潛隱的道家教育思想，也負載着中國教育的一脈傳統。

sentences.english: With multiple nodes, load-balancing and fail-over become possible.
sentences.chinese: 藉助多個節點，負載平衡和故障轉移變得可能。

sentences.english: Thus, you can measure the disk writes to estimate the additional load.
sentences.chinese: 因此，您可以通過測量磁盤寫來評估增加的負載。

sentences.english: No effort is required by the administrator to evaluate system load or to arrange the processing schedule.
sentences.chinese: 管理員不需要評估系統負載或作業處理時間。

sentences.english: The network load and server load can be lowered by the continuous transmission on the breakpoint.
sentences.chinese: 可以通過斷點續傳減小網絡負載和服務器負載。

sentences.english: The network load and server load can be lowered by the continuous transmission on the breakpoint.
sentences.chinese: 可以通過斷點續傳減小網絡負載和服務器負載。

sentences.english: The invention also discloses a preparation method and an application of the supported solid superacid.
sentences.chinese: 同時還公開了該負載型固體超強酸的製備方法和應用。

sentences.english: The cache can countervail server load.
sentences.chinese: 緩存可以抵消服務器負載。

sentences.english: Double proportional, load sensitive hydraulic circuit.
sentences.chinese: 液壓油路採用雙比例負載感應。

definition: to stake out (the boundaries of a property etc)/to demarcate/(engineering etc) to calibrate
